ygData.subject: RE: Bard Hate...
ygData.msgSnippet: I also think Bard Hate is a myth.  In my whole career, I ve yet to see a MOB come after me simply because I was a bard. Desmei Sightblinder Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
ygData.messageBody:
I also think Bard Hate is a myth. In my whole career, I've yet to see a MOB
come after me simply because I was a bard.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: galen@... [mailto:galen@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 9:19 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Bard Hate...
>
>
> From: galen@...
>
> I have been hearing rumors that "bard hate" does not really
> exist... Anyone actually have proof that it does?
